Explaining Altruism – An Evolutionary Approach and Its Limits

Supplemental DVD-ROM

(by Eckhart Arnold)



This DVD ROM includes the simulation results and the simulation software for the thesis „Explaining Altruism. An Evolutionary Approach and Its Limits“. Click on the following links to either browse the simulation results, start the interactive simulation program „CoopSim" or open the directory with the complete simulation software (including CoopSim as well as some non interactive simulation scripts).

  1. Start the interactive simulation program "CoopSim"

  2. Browse the simulation results of the "big series"

  3. Browse the results of the "Monte Carlo series"

  4. Open the folder with the simulation software
